title: Looking to buy T202 Speaker, Wood and Speaker rounding third…
author: Belfast1933

posts.post_title: Looking to buy T202 Speaker, Wood and Speaker rounding third…
posts.post_content:
Looking to buy.… T202 Triple Folder, Tris Speaker and Joe Wood.  Love the idea of 3 great Sox players, and 2 images of HOFer Speaker!

Image shown below just for illustration - nice, right??
Bump... still looking for this one, love to hear from you!
